promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young special elephant fire-type pokemon wearing ornate gemstones. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or elephant. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gembonara, a a chibi young special elephant fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Magma Fall. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "elephant", "fire" or "Gembonara". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, elephant-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lava texture background
generatedDescription: This petite pachyderm thrives in arid expanses, adorably blasting Magma Fall to create cozy burrows. At dusk, it sparkles like a ruby sunbeam.
